answers.answer: No heart rate doesn't predict gender that's just a old wives tale and your due date is an estimated date from your last menstrual cycle it's normal for the dates to change its just an estimate
Oh okay dang I was thinkin o my y is this baby growing so fast. Do I have early gestational diabetes. But that's very logical.

question: Hey ladies I got a ultrasound today and was told I'm 12w2d and my babies heart rate is 159? Can any one tell me if this means a girl. I got a previous scan did and was told I was 10wks3days with heart rate 156. So two questions is this a girl and how the heck did my scan change so dramatically  in a couple of weeks is my baby growing that fast its not able to keep up with its due date? I'm kinda confused
title: Does a heart rate predicts gender
